Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.1 Sārammaṇaduka » 10.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.1.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.1.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Mahantaraduka
Sārammaṇaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
27.
2375Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  sārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2376Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  sārammaṇā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
2377Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  sārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (3)
